title: Perceived Quality Without Grade Inflation: A Six-Year Operations Management Evaluation Across Delivery Modes Using Fuzzy Logic and Text Mining (2018–2023)
description: Longitudinal mixed-methods evaluation (2018–2023) of an Operations Management course. Deterministic Python pipeline reproduces SIRS trends, prompt-aware sentiment, and a fuzzy composite effectiveness index. Results show stable or improving perceived quality without grade inflation as the course scaled across delivery modes.
